Once upon a time, there was a little girl named Mia. Mia had a big heart and was very generous. She loved to help others and make them feel happy.
One sunny day, Mia saw a little bird with a hurt wing. She felt sad for the bird and wanted to help it. She took the bird to her mom and they helped fix the bird's wing. They gave the bird food and a safe place to rest.
After a few days, the bird felt much better. The bird was so thankful for Mia's help. The bird gave Mia a beautiful feather as a reward. Mia felt very

Suddenly, Mia had an idea. She said, “Let's have a contest! Whoever wins gets to keep the cube!”
Jack agreed. They agreed that whoever could roll the cube the farthest would win.
Mia and Jack both rolled the cube and kept track of how far it went. In the end, Mia rolled it further than Jack. She was the winner!
Mia was happy to keep the cube, but she also learned an important lesson that day. She realized it is more important to be nice and to play together than to compete

lip trembling and said “let’s build something together, Mia!” Mia looked up, her eyes brightened and said “Really?!”. Jake nodded and they went to work, building a big track with their toy trains. They spread some rocks around the track and added many different details. 
Mia and Jake had so much fun together, and the rail was forgotten. Together, they created something magical.

Suddenly, Mia saw her friend Tom. Tom was frustrated because he could not find his coat. "I can't find my coat," Tom said with a sad face. Mia wanted to help her friend, so they looked for Tom's coat together.
They looked under the trees, behind the bushes, and even in the sandbox. Finally, they found Tom's coat hanging on a fence. "Here is your coat, Tom!" Mia said happily. Tom was so happy, and they both laughed and played together for the rest of the day.

Mia and Tom played near the puddle. They jumped and splashed in it. They laughed and had a lot of fun. The yellow puddle made their day very happy. And they always remembered the day they found the yellow puddle.

One day, a little girl named Mia went for a walk. She saw an adorable cat. Mia wanted to play with the cat. She looked at the cat and the cat looked at her. They were happy.
Mia and the cat walked together. They saw a big rainbow in the sky. The rainbow was very pretty. Mia and the cat looked at the rainbow and smiled.
Suddenly, the cat jumped into the rainbow. Mia was surprised! The cat changed into a beautiful bird. The bird looked at Mia and sang a sweet song. Mia laughed and clapped her hands. The bird

said, "Thank you!" Then, the bird flew away, and Mia and her dad went home. They had a great trip and a fun story to tell.
